scripts.flowcore:apply:production: flowcore apply --v2 -f flowcore.yml && flowcore scenario apply -f flowcore.scenario.yml
scripts.flowcore:stream: flowcore scenario local -f flowcore.scenario.yml -f flowcore.scenario.local.yml -f flowcore.local.development.yml -s now -e http://localhost:3000/api -H "X-Secret: 1234"
scripts.flowcore:backfill: flowcore scenario local -f flowcore.scenario.yml -f flowcore.scenario.local.yml -f flowcore.local.development.yml -s first -t 30000 -e http://localhost:3000/api -H "X-Secret: 1234"
scripts.flowcore:backfill-open: flowcore scenario local -f flowcore.scenario.yml -f flowcore.scenario.local.yml -f flowcore.local.development.yml -t 30000 -e http://localhost:3000/api -H "X-Secret: 1234"
